name: VR Car Driving Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Car Driving Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
description:
When using Application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction. Ensure you read this document: http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
----
Feel like the rich man driving his expensive sport car in the middle of stunning Dubai environment.
Show the town to beautiful girl Mia.

Game Features :
*Stunning environment
*5 most expensive cars with luxurious interiors
*Highly optimized for purpose of great vr experience

Play on your favourite vr headset like VR Box or Google Cardboard or Figment VR.
